sentences.sContent: In my youth my father bound me to a blacksmith.
sentences.sCn: 在我年轻时我父亲立契让我给一名铁匠当学徒。

sentences.sContent: The smith [blacksmith] forges horseshoes with great skill.
sentences.sCn: 这个铁匠锻制马掌的手艺很高。

sentences.sContent: A hammer, pliers and an anvil - the main tools of a blacksmith.
sentences.sCn: 铁匠使用的重要工具：一把大锤、一把铁钳和一个大铁墩

trans.tranOther: someone who makes and repairs things made of iron, especially  horseshoes
